snippet.title: My Melody: Negai ga Kanau Fushigi na Hako gameplay (Nintendo 3DS)
snippet.description:
This is a kawaii Japanese Nintendo 3DS action game featuring My Melody released only in Japan on December 10, 2015. You get to play through various action stages chasing after Kuromi, collecting musical notes and unlock colouring sheets related to My Melody.

A nice little feature is that you can pick the colour of My Melody's hood before you play a level.

I recommend this if you like My Melody and have a Japanese Nintendo 3DS or custom firmware. It's really fun. ^_^

The story involves a mysterious wish granting box that My Melody got from her father; which is possibly the box Kuromi runs off with.

Please excuse the poor sound quality at times.

https://www.nintendo.co.jp/titles/50010000038537
